scenario: In 2023, Bob has wages of $108,358.42. Bob also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $48,885.65 for the year. Bob has passive income from another source of $10,316.65.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2023 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. Deductible: $10,316.65.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
